search_results.title: Dr. Joshua Bennett — Author. Professor. Artist.
search_results.snippet: Dr. Joshua Bennett is the author of The Sobbing School (Penguin, 2016)—which was a National Poetry Series selection and a finalist for an NAACP Image Award.

search_results.title: Dr. Joshua Bennett — About
search_results.snippet: Joshua is a Professor of Literature and Distinguished Chair of the Humanities at MIT. He lives in Massachusetts with his family. Download CV.

search_results.title: Joshua Bennett | LIT@MIT
